requestBody.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Views corporate vs local reporting split". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Agent update rollouts with canary testing". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.
